replies.msg:
首先你要明naive bayes (自己wiki naive bayes classifier) 係指assume 咗啲乜先。
如果X 係條n-d vector, X_j 係其中個格value.
Navie bayes 係assume X_i 同 X_j 係 independent when i =/= j
咁佢地嘅probability 就會變咗一堆product ...
講到呢度明唔明先？

明嘅應該 d 咗佢 = 0 揾maximum value 㗎啫

replies.msg:
會唔會係你唔知likelihood 點解？ 或者你根本唔知條問題想問乜？

條問題係想叫你用MLE 去揾呢個model (I.e laplacian ) 嘅parameter ( 即係mu_j 同 sigma_j for j = 1 to N)

方法係你寫晒返嗰likelihood 出黎（其實即係呢個dataset 嘅probability in terms of model parameter)， 中間會用Navie bayes assumption 去張佢爆開做一堆product of probability, 最 d 佢 set zero 揾maximum

你可以expect 佢地會involve X^i_j同 y^i
咁樣講會唔會知點做？

replies.msg:
求教... 係咪首先寫個naive Bayes 條式出黎e.g.
P(y|x1, ..., xn) = p(y)p(x1|y)p(x2|y)...p(xn|y)
之後再sub 個likelihood function 落R.H.S. (個堆p(xn|y)
姐係 p(y|x1, ... , xn) = p(y) ........
再D佢?

replies.msg:
類似啦，希望你記得p(y) 叫 prior, p(x1,...,xn|y) 叫 likelihood, p(y|x1,...,xn) 叫posterior

Posterior 只係proportional to prior x likelihood (要寫equal sign, 你要知埋嗰normalizing constant)

同埋Maximum Likelihood Estimator, 顧名思義就係嗰estimator 會 maximize 咗嗰likelihood, 所以你只係需要focus no likelihood 嗰part

又，記得你要consider 晒成個dataset M 咁多點

p(y=c, x_1, ..., x_N) = p(y=c)p(x_1|y=c)p(x_2|y=c)...p(x_N|y=c)
呢條式只係一支random vector嘅joint probability distribution

你可以想像依家其實有N+1個Random Variables
分別係 X_1, X_2, ..., X_N, Y (X_1到X_N係啲features, Y係label)
Under Naive Bayes嘅assumption
佢地嘅joint probability distribution就係上面條式
而每個 X_j|Y=c 都係follow laplacian (但係有唔同嘅parameters)
題目個Training set D就係抽M個samples整出嚟

依家個問題就係全部 (population) parameters (i.e. μ_{j|c}, σ_{j|c}) 都係unknown
我地要靠嗰M個data points估返最有可能嘅parameters出嚟
即係做Maximum Likelihood Estimation (MLE)

做MLE首先要寫低條Likelihood Function先
其實就係所有data points嘅joint probability distribution in terms of 堆parameters
如果全部data points都係independent嘅話
個Likelihood就會化簡到好似下圖咁

之後要sub啲咩入去就自己搞掂
記住maximise ln L 同 maximise L係一樣

同埋μ_{j|c}嘅estimator有啲難揾
搞唔掂就睇我上面post嘅第二條link
